data.title: De Nicola The Chobanidsof Kastamonu
data.meta_description: DeNicolaTheChobanidsofKastamonu - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This book provides an in-depth study of the Chobanid dynasty that ruled the region of Kastamonu in northwestern Anatolia during the 13th century. It focuses on the political history of the Chobanids and their role in consolidating local power in the border region between Islam and Christianity. The book also examines the Chobanids' cultural patronage, including literary works and architectural projects, that helped spread Persian influence and advance the process of Islamization in medieval Anatolia. By bringing to light neglected primary sources from the period, including administrative and religious texts, the book offers new insights into the religious, intellectual, and socio-political developments in northwestern Anatolia under Chob
